evidence.claim: Redivis utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure enabling scalable data solutions.
The platform supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data integration.
Redivis integrates with Snowflake for data warehousing capabilities.
They follow best practices to ensure HIPAA compliance in handling health data.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionality found.
